intro:
# # #   A GRIPPING ADVENTURE STORY # # #
A classical science fiction point and click adventure which takes you into a deep story and murky atmosphere, while solving logical puzzles. Accompany Tessa Carter and her talking robot as she finds out about herself and searches for a way to survive.

# # #   HIGH QUALITY INDIE GAME  # # # 
- 50 hand drawn locations full of atmosphere and detail
- Complete voice over in english and german
- Three dimensional characters and motion capture animations
- 7 – 9 hours of play time
- From the developer of the "Secret Files" and "Lost Horizon" series.

# # #   CLASSIC ADVENTURE GAMING ON NINTENDO SWITCH™   # # #
Designed and developed by the renowned adventure specialists of Animation Arts – the studio behind the best-selling Secret Files series – Lost Horizon takes its players back to the glory days of the point ‘n click adventures. Enjoy clever riddles, beautiful graphics and full voice acting.

# # #   AWARDS   # # #
- Adventure game of the year 2023 (AGOTY) as well as: 
   Best Screenplay, Best Audio and Best Visuals
- Adventure game of the year 2023 (Adventure Corner) as well as: 
   Best Story, Best Puzzles and Best Soundtrack
